feed.title: Travis Whitacre
feed.subtitle: I am a Postdoctoral Associate whose fields are health economics, economics of education and applied microeconomics with intersection into economic education and demography.

entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: I am a Postdoctoral Associate at Yale University. My primary fields are Health Economics and Applied Microeconometrics, but my research also intersects with the Economics of Education and Economic Demography. I have a specialized interest in children’s health and development, and the importance of mental healthcare in childhood on a child’s human capital development.
